info.title: Slack Team API
info.description: The API for management Slack Teams

get.summary: Gets the access logs for the current team.
get.description: Gets the access logs for the current team.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of results to return.

get.summary: Gets information about the current team.
get.description: Gets information about the current team.

get.summary: Gets the integration logs for the current team.
get.description: Gets the integration logs for the current team.

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: Filter logs to this Slack app. Defaults to all logs.

parameters.name: change_type
parameters.description: Filter logs with this change type. Defaults to all logs.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of results to return.

parameters.name: service_id
parameters.description: Filter logs to this service. Defaults to all logs.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Filter logs generated by this useru2019s actions. Defaults to all logs.
